name: pokedextracker
description: Ghost Theme for the Pok√©dexTracker Blog

scripts.bundle: zip -r pokedextracker-$(cat package.json | grep '"version"' | cut -d '"' -f4).zip theme
scripts.release:major: changelog -M && git add CHANGELOG.md && git commit -m 'updated CHANGELOG.md' && npm version major && git push origin && git push origin --tags && npm run setup:package
scripts.release:minor: changelog -m && git add CHANGELOG.md && git commit -m 'updated CHANGELOG.md' && npm version minor && git push origin && git push origin --tags && npm run setup:package
scripts.release:patch: changelog -p && git add CHANGELOG.md && git commit -m 'updated CHANGELOG.md' && npm version patch && git push origin && git push origin --tags && npm run setup:package
scripts.setup: npm run setup:ghost && npm run setup:link && npm run setup:package
